casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Reco KAMSON. No. 275P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Reco Kamson, for Kamson, Reco. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 5th of August 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
